name: Artist's house
description:
Small and cosy loft in the historical city center, near the park "Giardini Margherita".
Direct connection with the train station and Bologna's Fair.
Perfect for people keen for art, cinema and cooking. And of course the WIFI works perfectly!
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is like a village inside the historical city center. Quite and not expensive, well connected with the whole city, with some old shop and handcraft laboratory, and many nice cafes, bars, restaurants, "trattorie" and cinemas.
Just across "the ring street" there's the biggest park in town: Giardini Margherita.
And the best ice-cream shop in town is just one block form the house!
host_about:
Sono italiana e sono una regista di video documentari e sperimentali. Lavoro molto spesso in Francia, Belgio, Olanda e Germania.
Lavoro con il gruppo di artisti "ZimmerFrei".
Le mia passioni sono il cinema, il tango e il Mar Mediterraneo.

I'm from Italy and I work very often in Belgium, France, Holland and Germany.
My work is producing and shooting documentary films.
I work in a group of artist called ZimmerFrei.
I love cinema, tango and the Mediterranean see.

name: B&B S. Giovanni in Monte
description:
In the heart of Bologna there is a double bedroom with private bathroom and independent entrance.

In the heart of Bologna there is a lovely bedroom with private bathroom and private entrance.

CIR: 037006-BB-00604
neighborhood_overview: The B&B's location is strategic: it is located on the street of the Duse Theater, a short walk from the pedestrian Piazza S.Stefano with its “Seven Churches” and the Two Towers. You can reach Piazza Maggiore, the museums, the alleys of the market, the elegant Cavour Gallery and all the most interesting places of the city on foot in a few minutes. You can walk protected by the magnificent arcades that the historic center is equipped with, but the Margherita Gardens, the most beautiful park in Bologna, are also very close. In front of the B&B there are two great restaurants, the area is well frequented, lively but quiet and safe; in the surroundings there are numerous bars, restaurants, cinemas and  cozy places.
host_about: Sono romana ma vivo a Bologna dal 1991, sono architetto ed ho una figlia di 25 anni che mi aiuta come co-host. E' veramente emozionante pensare che delle persone decidano di venire nel mio B&B da posti lontanissimi e la maggiore soddisfazione è quando l'ospite decide di tornare da me!

name: Azeglio apartment, neighboring Piazza Maggiore
description: Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms that can accommodate up to 6 people in total comfort. Located a few steps from Piazza Maggiore, at the beginning of Via D'Azeglio, the most prestigious street in the city, it allows you to visit the city and its main attractions easily by moving on foot.
neighborhood_overview: We are exactly in the center of the old medieval city, adjacent to Piazza Maggiore. Piazza Maggiore is the main square of Bologna and is surrounded by the most important buildings of the city: Palazzo Podestà, which dates back to 1200, Palazzo Re Enzo, Palazzo d'Accursio, a monumental architectural complex of fourteenth-century origin, currently the headquarters of the Municipality of Bologna. The last side of the square is embellished by the Basilica of San Petronio, an example of Italian Gothic, begun at the end of the fourteenth century and still unfinished. Palazzo Banchi marks the beginning of the most famous portico of the city, the Pavaglione, which connects Piazza Maggiore to the Palazzo dell'Archiginnasio, the first headquarters of the University of Bologna: the oldest in the world. Today the headquarters of the University is less than 10 minutes walk from the apartment, in via Zamboni, half of which belongs to the Teatro Comunale.

name: B&B Fiera- Mini attico con terrazza panoramica
description: In front of the Fair, near the city center, bright, super attic, functionally divided into two rooms for 35 sq. meters total, with walk-in closet, exclusive bathroom, double bed and sofa bed that converts into a double bed or 2 single beds.  TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Independent entrance. For breakfast, it is equipped with microwave, refrigerator, toaster, kettle and espresso machine.  Exclusive use of a huge equipped terrace (chairs and table and a second outdoor shower).
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood, typically residential, is very lively, multi-ethnic and inhabited by many students, since it is the nearest suburb to the university area, which guarantees the existence of various premises (bars, pizzerias, various clubs etc.) and a certain movement even in the evening. There are also many shops, grocery stores and supermarkets open late, and all in all it turns rather quiet, precisely because of the presence until late at night of the many students who live in the area.
The neighborhood is also strongly influenced by the presence of the fair, with consequent repercussions in terms of services and destination for office use of many of the existing buildings there.

You will also find yourself immersed in the historic and thousand-year university area of Bologna.

description: Loft with private entrance and private garden, in the heart of Bologna ten minutes walk from Piazza Maggiore, nearby there are points of interest in the city. Very close to the Rizzoli Hospital, at the foot of the Bolognese hills, a stone's throw from Villa Ghigi Park. neighborhood_overview: The loft is located in a side street of Via S. Mamolo, a few steps from the Walls of Porta D'Azeglio, the area is characterized by clubs, bars and places where to spend the hours of the evening or for typical lunches, it is a green area of Bologna at the foot of the Bolognese Hills, in a few minutes you can reach the Parks of the Margherita Gardens, Villa Ghigi or the more hilly Cavaioni Park. The historic centre is just a few minutes away on foot and all areas of interest are within easy reach. Nearby are the Rizzoli Hospital, Villa Bellombre and Villalba.

host_about:
Salve sono Anna , sono nata e cresciuta nel centro storico di Bologna . Ho frequentato l'istituto Magistrale ed oggi sono un' insegnante.
Adoro viaggiare e  conoscere  persone da tutte le parti del mondo. Conosco bene Bologna e posso darti tanti consigli per farti vivere una bella esperienza sia gastronomica che culturale.
Amo cucinare , mi diverto a sperimentare nuovi piatti e condividerli con gli amici.
Oltre la cucina, cinema e libri sono il mio relax preferito.

name: B&B Bella Bologna -double room private bathroom
description:
Our B&B is located in one of the most old part of downtown, just outside of the door you’ll be already in the sightseeing part of the city and even though silence and peace are the perfect words to describe it.
The breakfast is included and served in the cortyard or in the dining hall in case of bad weather. You’ll find a buffet of local products; sweet, continental, gluten free and vegetarian options.
host_about:
Hi, 
I’m a swimming instructor and a tourist guide here in Bologna. swimming is my passion since I’m a kid and I also love to meet and interact with many people every day, share our stories and local tips.

Following the klokkargarden listing is my good friend Kris:
“I’m the pub manager of Aegir Bryggeri in Flåm, I love my job, since interacting with new people gives a constant and wonderful surprise every day”

Apartment in the Costa Zaragoza district, on the slopes of San Luca, in a quiet and peaceful location, a short distance from the Villa Chiara clinic (1.3 Km)
Renato Dall 'Ara stadium is a short walk away (1 km), the historic center is easily accessible by bus nr 20
The independent entrance from the private garden, the equipped kitchen, the living room with sofa bed, a double bedroom (total 4 beds) and the bathroom with washing machine make the ideal solution for short and long periods!
neighborhood_overview: Just a 2-minute walk from the bus stop with frequent connections to the City Center (10 min) and the Fair Zone (20 min) and 500 meters from Dall 'Ara Stadium. Unipol Arena events and concerts, Highway and Tangenziale, Industrial Zone and Airport reachable in a few minutes by car . A few steps away, useful amenities such as Lava Tokens and 24-hour Supermarkets, pharmacy, bars, restaurants, pizzerias. A few meters away, Paddle courts. All in one area with communal gardens and free parking.

name: The courts of via Fondazza (very central)
description:
Le corti is a quiet and comfortable apartment with more than 4 beds and great flavor in the heart of Bologna.
A stone's throw from the most beautiful places in the city, the house allows easy access to everything that Bologna offers the visitor.
The two internal courtyards make it the silent and ideal place to relax and have lunch or dinner outdoors and make the house fresh and enjoyable even in the height of summer.
Book now to live an unforgettable experience in Bologna.
neighborhood_overview:
The Santo Stefano neighborhood is a quiet and prestigious neighborhood that takes its name from the famous Basilicas and Piazza Santo Stefano.
The most central part of the neighborhood is pedestrianized and full of places to taste the typical Bolognese cuisine, but also to enjoy an aperitif sitting outdoors and admiring the city.

Very rich in services, well connected to both the railway station and the bus station which are less than 2 km away.
You will also notice many bicycles that you can rent by downloading the RideMovi App for free.

name: Labirint Central Suite Goito
description: Enjoy a relaxing vacation in this downtown space. The apartment is located in the historic center, literally 280 meters from Via Dell 'Indipendenza and a 3-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore. It is a nice two-room apartment, consisting of a double bedroom, a living room with an open kitchen and a bathroom. There is a sofa bed that can be used to accommodate a third guest.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the historic center (ZTL Zone), literally 280 meters from Via Dell 'Indipendenza and a 3-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore.
Multiple gastronomic offerings within walking distance, bars, restaurants, wineries…
About 100 meters away, a convenient supermarket on the adjacent Via Oberdan.
Tobacco shops, pharmacies, and the best shopping shops in Via Dell 'Indipendenza, as well as several bus stops to reach multiple destinations.
About a 15-minute walk to Central Station!
